name: Abeona
description:
What is Abeona?
Abeona is a short story based adventure game with heavily inspired plat former elements . Originally created for submission in a school based competition that was canceled due to COVID-19

Mechanics?

Abeona utilizes advance platformer mechanics to add fluidity to the controls as well as a unique "companion" mechanic that plays a key role in the story.
Plans For The Future?

In the future i wan't to remake abeona into a complete game, what you see now is short "One-Shot" of what i want to create, the first version of many to
